LanguageData.CS_SettingLayerCategoriesDescription: Should apparel be sorted on what layer they cover?
LanguageData.CS_SettingTechCategoriesDescription: Should apparel be sorted on their tech-level?
LanguageData.CS_SettingModCategoriesDescription: Should apparel be sorted on what mod they are added from?
LanguageData.CS_SettingDeselectOptions: Max two categories can be selected at the same time
LanguageData.CS_SettingCombineLayers: Combine layer-categories with the same name
LanguageData.CS_SettingCombineLayersDescription: If two or more layers have the same label, should they be combined into one category?
LanguageData.CS_SettingArmoredCategoriesDescription: Should apparel with armor-values be sorted in a sub-category?
LanguageData.CS_SettingArmoredLowValue: Low value to count as armored: {0}%
LanguageData.CS_SettingPsyfocusCategoriesDescription: Should apparel with psyfocus-values be sorted in a sub-category?
LanguageData.CS_SettingRoyaltyCategoriesDescription: Should apparel fit for Royalty be sorted in a sub-category?
LanguageData.CS_SettingCEDescription: Since Combat Extended modifies a the armor system to be generally increased values this multiplier is used when CE is loaded. The logic is not perfect since CE patches may not increase the armorvalues the same way, but I found that 5 is a reasonable setting for vanilla apparel at least.
